description: This file contains utility functions for generating prompts related to JSON output and response model formatting, primarily used in AI or agent-based systems. It includes functions to construct JSON prompts based on response models and to generate descriptive prompts for response models.

methods.name: get_json_output_prompt
methods.description: Generates a JSON output prompt string based on the provided response model, handling different types such as string, list, or pydantic BaseModel.

methods.name: get_response_model_format_prompt
methods.description: Creates a descriptive prompt string for a given pydantic BaseModel, listing its fields and their descriptions.
